command.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000) if not exists(select 1 from sysdaterules where user_id = @@userID) select @message = 'this._fromDate=null;this._toDate=null;' else begin select @message = 'this._fromDate=' + case when ngay_ct1 is null then 'null' else 'new Date(' + replace(convert(varchar(7), ngay_ct1, 21), '-', ',') + '-1' + ',' + ltrim(str(day(ngay_ct1), 2)) + ')' end + ';this._toDate=' + case when ngay_ct2 is null then 'null' else 'new Date(' + replace(convert(varchar(7), ngay_ct2, 21), '-', ',') + '-1' + ',' + ltrim(str(day(ngay_ct2), 2)) + ')' end + ';this._not_vc_search=' + rtrim(not_vc_search) + ';' from sysdaterules where user_id = @@userID end select @message = @message + 'active$VoucherFilter$(this);' select @message as message return

if not exists(select 1 from sysdaterules where user_id = @@userID) insert into sysdaterules(user_id, ngay_ct1, ngay_ct2, not_vc_search) values (@@userID, @ngay_ct1, @ngay_ct2, @not_vc_search) else update sysdaterules set ngay_ct1 = @ngay_ct1, ngay_ct2 = @ngay_ct2, not_vc_search = @not_vc_search where user_id = @@userID
